1380520.name: Racing Outlaws
1380520.description:
Best Drag n Drift Car Racing Games

Join the most furious Offroad Outlaws on racing tracks
Quench your thirst for unruly racing , release your stress while you dash destroy and crash the objects on the road as you race along the most realistic racing tracks with most furious competitors.

Experience the lawlessness at its peak,love of brutal destruction at its height and the never quenching thirst for the absolute madness called Redline Racing.

If you are a fan of CSR SUP Need for speed Asphalt MMX hill dash 2 Hill climb racing color road need for speed or Smashy road- You should try this game first and see the adrenaline flow through your every pore of your skin. The world where winning is more beloved than life, crashing is preffered over passivity and craziness is preffered over sanity. Welcome to the insane world of racing called ....REDLINE Racing.
Experience all of the excitement, competition and glory of championship racing.
Features:

-30 visually amazing and challenging Levels

-Astonishing physics brings chaos to another level

-Intelligent enemies driving beautiful racing cars

-Highly detailed 3D Graphics

*具有完全音频支持的语言
